page.title: 15LIFE IN A NEWSAGENT'S SHOP
page.content: My wife wakes me at 5.30a.m. I get up wash & dress then go down stairs and fetch the papers in from out side the stockroom door.I un-pack them and put them up for delivery. The shop opens at 7.00 and Duncan,Ilona and Dietlind are up.They're my children. Duncan and Ilona go to school at 8.30.When they have gone Dietlind makes my wife and I a cup of coffee; Then she takes the dog for a walk. While she is doing that my wife & I are taking it in turns to do the shop When Dietlind comes back she has her hair done, then she goes to school. In the morning whilst we are open we sell news papers which are, {The Sun, {The Mirror,The Daily Telegraph etc. We sell daily papers,weekly,& evening {(Shropshire Star). } At 12 o'clock Dietlind comes for dinner from school. We close from 1-2 p.m.& again at 5.30.
